languages.text: "Идея переговоров мне нравится. Как только наследник госпожи Чорда вступит в права, я немедленно вышлю к нему парламентеров".
"I like the idea of negotiating. As soon as an heir formally succeeds Lady Chorda, I'll send a truce envoy to them at once."
languages.original_text: "Идея переговоров мне нравится. Как только наследник госпожи Чорда вступит в права, я немедленно вышлю к нему парламентеров".

traits.locale_text: "I like the idea of negotiating. As soon as an heir formally succeeds Lady Chorda, I'll send a truce envoy to them at once."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "I like the idea of negotiating. As soon as an heir formally succeeds Lady Chorda, I'll send a truce envoy to them at once."

languages.text: “我喜欢谈判的主意。只要有人正式继承了库尔达女士的位置，我就会派我的人与他们进行和谈。”
languages.original_text: "I like the idea of negotiating. As soon as an heir formally succeeds Lady Chorda, I'll send a truce envoy to them at once."

traits.locale_text: “我喜欢谈判的主意。只要有人正式继承了库尔达女士的位置，我就会派我的人与他们进行和谈。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「交渉するのはいい考えだ。チョーダ様の後継者が決まり次第、すぐに休戦の使節を送ろう」
languages.original_text: "I like the idea of negotiating. As soon as an heir formally succeeds Lady Chorda, I'll send a truce envoy to them at once."

traits.locale_text: 「交渉するのはいい考えだ。チョーダ様の後継者が決まり次第、すぐに休戦の使節を送ろう」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Me gusta la idea de negociar. Tan pronto como un heredero suceda formalmente a Lady Chorda, les enviaré un enviado de tregua de inmediato».
languages.original_text: "I like the idea of negotiating. As soon as an heir formally succeeds Lady Chorda, I'll send a truce envoy to them at once."

traits.locale_text: «Me gusta la idea de negociar. Tan pronto como un heredero suceda formalmente a Lady Chorda, les enviaré un enviado de tregua de inmediato».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Verhandeln, der Einfall gefällt mir. Sobald Lady Chordas Erbe feststeht, schicke ich einen Gesandten, um einen Waffenstillstand auszuhandeln."
languages.original_text: "I like the idea of negotiating. As soon as an heir formally succeeds Lady Chorda, I'll send a truce envoy to them at once."

traits.locale_text: "Verhandeln, der Einfall gefällt mir. Sobald Lady Chordas Erbe feststeht, schicke ich einen Gesandten, um einen Waffenstillstand auszuhandeln."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « La perspective de négocier me plaît. Dès qu'un héritier aura officiellement succédé à dame Chorda, je lui enverrai un messager pour demander une trêve. »
languages.original_text: "I like the idea of negotiating. As soon as an heir formally succeeds Lady Chorda, I'll send a truce envoy to them at once."

traits.locale_text: « La perspective de négocier me plaît. Dès qu'un héritier aura officiellement succédé à dame Chorda, je lui enverrai un messager pour demander une trêve. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Görüşme fikri hoşuma gitti. Resmî bir vâris, Leydi Chorda'nın yerini aldıktan sonra kendisine derhâl bir ateşkes elçisi göndereceğim."
languages.original_text: "I like the idea of negotiating. As soon as an heir formally succeeds Lady Chorda, I'll send a truce envoy to them at once."

traits.locale_text: "Görüşme fikrini severim. Resmî bir vâris, Leydi Chorda'nın yerini aldıktan sonra kendisine derhâl bir ateşkes elçisi göndereceğim."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
